metadata.title: CVE-2022-3293 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Email addresses were leaked in WebHook logs in GitLab EE affecting allversions from 9.3 prior to 15.2.5, 15.3 prior to 15.3.4, and 15.4 prior to15.4.1

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
